subject: Re: [junit] Running test case using suite that include other suite
msgSnippet: ... Yes. TestSetup implements Test, so you can pass your TestSetup to TestSuite.addTest(). -- J. B. Rainsberger, Diaspar Software Services
messageBody:
wan_ho_2004 wrote:

> I have a working scenario contained in a class that defines its own
> suite and uses TestSetup to wrap the suite. Can I include that
> class/suite in other suites?

Yes. TestSetup implements Test, so you can pass your TestSetup to
TestSuite.addTest().
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416 791-8603
Let's write software that people understand
